info.title: Developer Garden MMS API
info.description: The Send MMS service allows sending MMS messages to mobile phones.

get.description: The Send MMS service allows sending MMS messages to mobile phones.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Account ID of the sub-account that should be billed for the service use. If the parameter is not specified, the main account is billed.

parameters.name: attachment
parameters.description: Base64 encoded attachment to send. (optional)  Attachments of arbitrary type (Picture, Sound, Video, Text) are supported. The file type has to be specified through contentType. Furthermore, the file name has to be specified through filename.  At least one of the fields, message and attachment, has to be present.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: File type of the attachment, if an attachment is to be sent.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: is one of production, sandbox or mock

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: File name of the attachment, if an attachment is to be sent. (optional)

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: text message. (optional). At least one of the fields, message and attachment, has to be present.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Recipient phone numbers, separated by commas (,).

parameters.name: originator
parameters.description: The sender as displayed to the recipient.
